kDesc
A simple, blue swimming top with a grown-up feel to it. [#Legal]
Haut de maillot bleu, très simple mais très “femme”.[#Legal]
Blaue Schwimmbekleidung, die einfach und erwachsen wirkt.[#Legal]
Un costume da bagno blu, semplice e composto. [#Legal]
Traje de baño azul con un aire de simplicidad y madurez.[#Legal]
シンプルで大人っぽい雰囲気の青い水着。[#Legal]
심플하고 어른스러운 분위기의 파란색 수영복. [#Legal]
A simple, blue swimming top with a grown-up feel to it. [#Legal]
